Text.Page:
The Scions of Lok have established a foothold and erected the Valselok Shrine. They must be stopped, or at least slowed.

Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:6#3031#Lokian reavers} and {@LinkCreature:6#3032#mystics} around the shrine.

Report to Embarr near the shrine when your mission is complete.

They can't let go of Lok. Why revere a dead god?

Anyway, let's see what you have.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
